overview:
Adal coordinates the overall operations of Ooyala in Mexico, where he co-manages the Client Services Engineering Group, the 24/7 Technical Support team, Account Management, and the Sales Development and Marketing teams.

Before Ooyala, Adalberto was the CEO and Co-Founder of Inviko. During his leadership at Inviko, the company received several national and international awards including 1st Place in the Mexico Intel Entrepreneurship Challenge. Adalberto was awarded by Ernst & Young and CNN-Expansion, Mexicoâ€™s University Student of the Year for Finance (2007). He brings startup experience as co-founder of three previous companies and has been invited as a guest speaker for several Mexican Universities on entrepreneurial issues and judge for startup contests including Startup Weekend GDL. Adalberto has worked for, collaborated with and/or consulted on business, finance and strategy issues to 20 companies & institutions from China, Brazil, the USA and Mexico. He can speak, read and write Chinese-Mandarin, Portuguese, English and Spanish. Adalberto has a B.S. in Industrial Engineering and a minor in Systems Engineering from Instituto TecnolÃ³gico y de Estudios Superiores de Monterrey (ITESM).
